songs.title: Samuel’s Song
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
NIGGAS!

[Verse]
The wolves are coming with their guns
You better run Samuel, run
And we can hear them motherfuckas come
You better run
The wolves are coming with them Ak-40s

[Bridge]
Run (here they come)
(x5)

[Hook]
Samuel is dead
(he's dead, he's dead)
(x2)
